name: Kays Harbor Technologies
tagline: Web, Mobile and Software Development Company
description:
Kays Harbor is a global software development company with its client base across US, UK, Western Europe, South East Asia and Australia.
Our expertise lies in offering a consulting led approach to your IT & software development needs, led by our in-house team of project managers, business analysts, designers and software developers.
At Kays Harbor, each one of us is committed towards making your business a success through technology led innovation. Our top management is personally involved in every relationship, ensuring you get a personal touch to the entire IT service delivery experience.
Why our clients keep giving us repeat business? It’s because they love our clear open communication, outstandingly responsive attitude, honest & fair dealing, and ingenuity and foresight.
But the biggest reason: it’s our enthusiastic and talented team which is there to “make software happen” for your business success.
Don’t just take our word, experience it for yourself. Request a free technology consultation session today. 
At Kays Harbor, our services for enterprises, SMEs and startups span across the following areas: -
Mobile Application Development for Android, iOS and Windows platform
Enterprise Custom Application Development
Web Application Development
Software Consulting Services
BI/ Analytics Solution Development
Software Testing and Quality Assurance Services
